actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include inhalation therapy provided to patients of a skilled nursing facility among the extended care services for which payment may be made under the hospital insurance benefits program.

summary.text: Requires, under title XVIII of the Social Security Act (Medicare), that inhalation therapy provided to patients of a skilled nursing facility be included among the extended care services for which payment may be made under the hospital insurance benefits program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include inhalation therapy provided to patients of a skilled nursing facility among the extended care services for which payment may be made under the hospital insurance benefits program.
